name: Darkest Tower
description:
The Darkest Tower is a turn-based pass and play game for 1-4 players. The objective of the game is to gather an army, collect the three keys to the Darkest Tower, and defeat the evil contained within. There are a myriad of obstacles in your way: heinous brigands, deadly plague, and mind-numbing labyrinths to name a few. Can you and your company overcome these afflictions and emerge victorious?

Features:

*Content*
-Local multiplayer for up to four players!
-Automatic game saves!
-Leaderboards!
-Three difficulty levels!

*Design*
-Intuitive and easy to follow UI.
-Smooth, polished touch controls.
-Hand-crafted sound effects/music.
-Immersive graphics and animations.
-Stunning hand-drawn artwork.

Enjoy!
